definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: How does that ever allow you to advertise in connection with sports?
sentences.chinese: 这样你们就可以做与体育赛事有关的广告了？

sentences.english: Many world famous tennis players will take part in this tournament.
sentences.chinese: 多位世界知名的网球手会参加这项赛事。

sentences.english: Drinks Station will be located at Run Course and Event Center.
sentences.chinese: 大会将于跑步赛段及赛事中心设置水站。

sentences.english: Size 5 footballs which provided by the Organiser should be used in all matches.
sentences.chinese: 所有赛事均使用由大会提供之五号足球作赛。

sentences.english: A fair game depends on an unbiased referee.
sentences.chinese: 一场公平的赛事取决于一位大公无私的球证。

sentences.english: The event led to a three-way play-off but it wasn't an impressive finish.
sentences.chinese: 这场赛事最后是三方决赛，但结局并不吸引人。

sentences.english: He shall have his medal and diploma in the above-mentioned event withdrawn," the IOC said.
sentences.chinese: 他在前述赛事中的金牌与荣誉证书应被收回。

sentences.english: The winner of each tournament will receive an exemption into the following months tournament.
sentences.chinese: 每轮赛事的获胜者都将获邀免费参加下一个月的赛事。

sentences.english: The winner of each tournament will receive an exemption into the following months tournament.
sentences.chinese: 每轮赛事的获胜者都将获邀免费参加下一个月的赛事。

sentences.english: They have now endured seven defeats in all competitions and there are a lot of stiff challenges still.
sentences.chinese: 他们在各项赛事中已输掉七场，而硬仗还数不胜数。

sentences.english: The event was cancelled due to the weak wind.
sentences.chinese: 因风力太弱该次赛事取消。

sentences.english: More running sponsorships are in the works, according to Adidas.
sentences.chinese: 据阿迪达斯透露还将为更多跑步赛事提供赞助。

sentences.english: Players who appear in the Champions League become cup-tied and command significantly less in the market.
sentences.chinese: 打了冠军杯的球员们如果转会就不能参加欧洲赛事了。

sentences.english: The first week of group stage after the event, there are more dissatisfied with the team.
sentences.chinese: 第一周的分组赛赛事举行之后，有更多球队表示不满。
窜入记忆里的还有数不清的体育赛事。

sentences.english: Which international sport events have been carried out around the Qinghai tourism resources?
sentences.chinese: 围绕青海特色旅游资源开展的国际性体育赛事有哪些？

definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
to compete/to take part in a competition
invitation tournament (e.g. between schools or firms)
